channel.title: Jerry Savelle Ministries Video Podcast
channel.description: Jerry Savelle teaches the uncompromising Word of God in down to earth terms, applicable to your life, dreams, and destiny. Discover through God's Word how you can be a victorious winner in life. The Jerry Savelle Ministries television broadcast airs in over two hundred countries worldwide. Find more information and resources at www.jerrysavelle.org.

item.title: Why You're Not Helpless, Reign in Life
item.description: Many believers, even those who have walked with God for years, are unaware of a vital biblical truth: through Jesus Christ, they have been given authority to reign in life. Drawing from foundational scriptures such as Romans 5:17, Dr. Jerry Savelle teaches that life is not meant to have dominion over the believer. On the contrary, the believer is called to reign in life. Understanding this God-given authority changes how we speak, how we face challenges, and what we expect in our daily lives. We pray this series brings clarity and will transform your everyday Christian living! God bless you!

item.title: Dare to Believe God's Word, Life of Faith
item.description: Do you want everything God has provided through His Son, Jesus Christ? Then it‚Äôs time to make the decision to live by faith! In this series, Dr. Jerry Savelle teaches how to receive faith, where to apply it, and how to use it in your everyday life. Gain a deeper revelation of God‚Äôs glory and understand what He expects from you and me. We pray that you will make the decision to live by faith, seek first the kingdom of God‚Äînot things, but God Himself‚Äîand yield to His wonderful will, receiving the blessing of God with open arms. üìñ ‚ÄúNow faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen.‚Äù ‚Äî Hebrews 11:1 üìñ ‚ÄúTherefore I say to you, whatever you ask for in prayer, believe that you have received it, and it will be yours.‚Äù ‚Äî Mark 11:24

item.title: Expect God's Provision, Living in the Fullness of the Blessing
item.description: The blessing of God is a supernatural empowerment that comes on you when you‚Äôre born again. Yet many believers never step into the fullness of what God intended. When the blessing is active in your life, you‚Äôre no longer limited to the natural‚Äîyou have something working for you that others don‚Äôt. God desires every one of His children to live in that fullness. Our prayer is that you take hold of what His Word says about you, walk in the blessing He‚Äôs pronounced over your life, and rise above every obstacle as you step into a new level of victory and increase.

item.title: You Can Live a Satisfied Life, Redeemed and Blessed
item.description: These biblical principles will change your life forever. In this series, Dr. Jerry Savelle reveals what it truly means to be redeemed and blessed. It is normal for a believer to walk in everything Jesus paid for‚Äîpeace, healing, and more‚Äîevery single day. This revelation transformed Dr. Jerry and Dr. Carolyn Savelle‚Äôs lives‚Äîand it can transform yours too. The apostle Paul called this message the most important truth he ever delivered to the church. As you watch, you‚Äôll gain a deeper understanding of the significance of the cross and the power of Jesus‚Äô victorious resurrection. His finished work is the foundation for God‚Äôs power and the fullness of His blessing operating in your life today. Get this revelation‚Äîand watch your life begin to change before your eyes. Discover what happened at Calvary and how it applies to you as a believer right now.

item.title: How to Experience Peace Daily, Redeemed and Blessed
item.description: What is Calvary all about? In this powerful series, Dr. Jerry Savelle reveals that God‚Äôs redemptive plan is both complete and perfect‚Äîcovering every area of your life. Jesus didn't just redeem us from a hopeless life and a dark eternity. He gave us so much more. And it all began at the cross. The apostle Paul called this revelation the most important truth he ever passed on to the church. As you watch, you‚Äôll gain a deeper understanding of the significance of the cross and the power of Jesus‚Äô victorious resurrection. His finished work is the foundation for God‚Äôs power and the fullness of His blessing in your life.

item.title: Live In the Fullness of God, Intensity of Your Desire
item.description:
Nothing you‚Äôre believing God for is too big.

In this teaching, Dr. Carolyn Savelle shares a revelation God gave her in 1999; showing how your faith will produce results in proportion to the "Intensity of Your Desire."

This truth has transformed her life, and now she invites you to be encouraged and empowered by these life-changing principles.

This truth has transformed her life, and now she invites you to be encouraged and empowered by these life-changing principles.

item.title: How to Pray the Prayer of Petition, The Prayer of Petition
item.description:
Get results when you pray like THIS!

The Prayer of Petition has long been recognized throughout christian history as, "The prayer that gets results." We want to help you apply this wisdom into your prayer life!

Join us as Dr. Jerry Savelle gives a thorough teaching on prayer but specifically, the Prayer of Petition.

We believe that the knowledge of this prayer will be life changing to your walk with God. After watching this series, you will be equipped and ready to apply the wonderful gift of prayer God has blessed everyone to utilize today!

item.title: Exercise Your Authority Over Satan, Free at Last
item.description:
Feeling trapped? Stuck in oppressive thoughts or anything else weighing you down?

There is a way you can be set free!

You don't have to suffer from oppression, old habits, doubt or unbelief. We believe that the series you're about hear from Dr. Jerry Savelle, will open your eyes to the truth about your situation and ignite in you the desire to get back on your feet.

As you watch today‚Äôs message, remember this:

God loves you, we love you, and He is walking beside you ‚Äî and within you ‚Äî every step of the way.

Enjoy the message!

item.title: 3 Keys to Increasing God's Way, Increase God's Way
item.description:
God wants you to increase in every area of your life‚Äîspiritually, physically, mentally, socially, even financially.

To fully experience God‚Äôs blessing in your life, you have to constantly remind yourself that God is your source.

You have to know that He's the all Sufficient One, Supreme Provider and that He never runs out. He has more than enough to meet every need in your life. As a matter of fact, increase is your covenant right as a believer!

As you listen to Dr. Jerry Savelle's message, "Increase God's Way," let the truths he shares sink into your heart and never forget that God is your provider.

item.title: If Satan Can't Steal Your Joy, Part 4
item.description:
Are you facing overwhelming problems and feeling defeated? Do life's challenges and adversities have you discouraged and joyless? No matter how bad your situation may seem, the devil cannot defeat a joyful believer.

In this series, Dr. Jerry Savelle unpacks the number one way to stand firm against the wiles of the enemy.

Don't allow the devil to steal what Jesus has already purchased for you through His death, burial, and resurrection. Let your joy turn the tables on the enemy and put him on the run!

item.title: Redeemed and Restored, Part 4
item.description:
If you've been feeling weak or devastated in your life, then this series is for you!

In this 4-part series, Dr. Jerry Savelle teaches about being "Redeemed and Restored"! Get this revelation rooted deeply within your spirit and live in the overflowing goodness of God‚Äôs favor as He turns your life around for the better!

If we remain focused on the promises God has given us, we can expect to experience His unlimited favor in every area of our lives. God has a plan past what the enemy is trying to do, or what the world is trying to throw at you - He has a plan to restore you. Not just back to what you used to be but above and beyond.

In this 4-part series, Dr. Jerry Savelle teaches about being ‚ÄúRedeemed and Restored‚Äù! Get this revelation rooted deeply within your spirit and live in the overflowing goodness of God‚Äôs favor as He turns your life around for the better!
If we remain focused on the promises God has given us, we can expect to experience His unlimited favor in every area of our lives. God has a plan past what the enemy is trying to do, or what the world is trying to throw at you - He has a plan to restore you. Not just back to what you used to be but above and beyond.

item.title: Living In A Continual State Of God's Favor, Part 4
item.description:
God's Favor is for every believer in Christ Jesus ‚Äî that's you!

In this series, Dr. Savelle teaches on the topic of how to continually live in the manifestations of God's Favor. As believers in Christ (and living in the last days), we should expect to see God's Favor profusely abound in our lives today! This is not only for the preacher or the pastor at your local church. This is for everyone who is apart of the body of Christ!

Let the favor of God in your life become more than a testimony that only happens every once in a while. Instead, let it be your daily reality through the receiving of God's Word.

item.title: The Established Heart, Part 4
item.description: Being immovable and unshaken is a desire for everyone. The question is, how do we get to that point? In this series, Dr. Savelle shares one of his favorite teachings from Kenneth Copeland that has impacted him tremendously for decades. In this world, we will have tribulation, but take heart and listen to what the Lord is saying to you through this series on having an established heart.

item.title: Calling In Your Harvest, Part 4
item.description:
God intended from the beginning to have man's life be sustained by the seeds he sows. When we engage in His law of seedtime and harvest, we, as children of God, have the opportunity to reap a beautiful harvest in every area of our lives. In this series, Dr. Jerry Savelle will be teaching on how to call in your harvest. Join us and experience the fullness of God's intention for your life.

There is no limit to what God's favor can do in your life. Jerry Savelle shares biblical insight and personal examples of God's favor that will cause you to walk in a higher level of this changing spiritual force. Discover how God has surrounded you with a shield of favor that will protect you from the enemy's attacks and bring you increase. Develop your faith and expectation for God's favor to manifest today!

item.title: God‚Äôs Promise to Prosper You, Part 4
item.description: God has promised to prosper you. Biblical prosperity is God's intended lifestyle for believers. Jerry Savelle establishes a biblical foundation for understanding the principles of divine prosperity and provides a step-by-step explanation of what it takes to walk out of financial bondage. Learn how to enjoy the peace and confidence that come from obeying God and applying His principles to your life. You will also learn how the blessing of God and the Favor of God work together to empower you and produce opportunities for prosperity. Learn to step out of financial bondage into God's promised prosperity today.

item.title: No Boundaries - Part 4
item.description:
Why settle for the ordinary when you can have the extraordinary? Many Christians are spending their lives living beneath their privileges as children in God's family. However, as children of God, we are created for more.

In No Boundaries, Jerry Savelle reveals the unseen limits that have been holding you back from the life you are destined for. You will discover how to recognize boundaries, what makes you different from a limited world, the origins and causes of boundaries, proven keys to living life free from negative boundaries, and more!

Start living a life free from the negative boundaries holding you back. You have been created to live life more abundantly!

Why settle for the ordinary when you can have the extraordinary? Many Christians are spending their lives living beneath their privileges as children in God‚Äôs family. However, as children of God, we are created for more.
In No Boundaries, Jerry Savelle reveals the unseen limits that have been holding you back from the life you are destined for. You will discover how to recognize boundaries, what makes you different from a limited world, the origins and causes of boundaries, proven keys to living life free from negative boundaries, and more!
Start living a life free from the negative boundaries holding you back. You have been created to live life more abundantly!

item.title: The Force of Joy - Part 4
item.description: Do you struggle to maintain joy? Are life's challenges trying to steal your joy? Are you ready to look adversity in the eye and still rejoice? In these teachings, Brother Jerry reveals how to develop, cultivate, and protect your joy. He speaks on how joy can bring victories into your life and how to stand strong against the devil's attacks. Discover how joy can strengthen you and equip you to overcome every attack of the enemy!

item.title: Excel in Your Calling, Part 5
item.description:
Experience God's blessing in your life like never before. In these teachings Jerry Savelle lays a biblical foundation for "Living in the fullness of the blessing" and encourages you to live a life without limitations!

The blessing of God is an empowerment that comes on your life when you are born again. But sadly, many Christians are not living in the fullness of the blessing that God intended. When the blessing of God is on your life, you are not limited to the natural any more. You have something working for you that other people don‚Äôt have.

item.title: Becoming Maximum Results Minded, Part 4
item.description:
Are you tired of settling for mediocrity? It's time to break free from limiting beliefs and unleash your maximum potential.

Don't allow small thinking to hold you back. Begin to seize God's maximum results today. Learn God's strategy for overcoming life's challenges and experience unstoppable momentum in your life.

‚ÄúAnd my God will supply every need of yours according to his riches in glory in Christ Jesus.‚Äù Philippians 4:19

item.title: Supernatural Provision, Part 6
item.description:
Have you ever wondered how God will provide for your needs? The biblical truths detailed in these messages will teach you how faith brings resources, how to receive vision from God, and how to take charge of your destiny.

Are you ready to see their God inspired visions come to fruition? We are offering the book Supernatural Provision for Your Vision for your gift of any amount.

Read it and discover how God can supply all your needs.

"O come, let us sing unto the LORD: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation." Psalms 95:1

item.title: Living Your Dream, Part 4
item.description:
What if God has something bigger and greater for your life?

God can make it happen even when others say it's impossible. We serve a God in whom nothing is impossible.

Strengthen your faith to experience God-given, God-honoring dreams. Break free from small thinking and small living, and begin to see God-sized opportunities and advancements.

Don't let unseen limits hold you back any longer, begin to dream bigger, go further, and achieve more for God.

‚ÄúFor the dream comes through much effort‚Äù Ecclesiastes 5:3

Strengthen your faith to experience God-given, God-honoring dreams. Break free from small thinking and small living, and begin to see God-sized opportunities and advancements.
Don't let unseen limits hold you back any longer, begin to dream bigger, go further, and achieve more for God.
‚ÄúFor the dream comes through much effort‚Äù Ecclesiastes 5:3

item.title: Building a Lasting Impression, Part 6
item.description:
What impression is your life making? How are you affecting and changing the world around you? You are not meant to live an ordinary, mediocre life.

God's blessing will cause you to make a lasting impression that echoes into eternity.

You have an incredible chance to show a piece of heaven to those around you; to reflect God's goodness in your everyday life.

‚ÄúThe Lord is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble; and He knows those who trust in Him.‚Äù (Nahum 1:7)

item.title: The Power of Focus, Part 6
item.description:
Are life's demands distracting you from your true potential? It's time to filter out the noise and live with clear determination.

In this series you will learn How to control negative thoughtsSecrets to living by divine precision, and Steps to align your focus with God's plan

Seize this opportunity to refocus your life and begin living with a clear and dedicated vision. Your journey to a life of divine clarity and purpose starts now. Embrace the power of focus today.

‚ÄúBut seek first His kingdom and His righteousness, and all these things will be added to you.‚Äù Matthew 6:33

item.title: Progressing and Advancing, Part 3
item.description:
Are you ready to unlock God's best in your life? Your moment of freedom has arrived.

It's time to bid farewell to restrictive small-thinking beliefs and unleash your God-given capacity.

Take a bold step in faith and fulfill your divine calling to embrace what's rightfully yours in Christ.

‚ÄúThe LORD himself goes before you and will be with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.‚Äù Deuteronomy 31:8

item.title: Our Covenant of Increase, Part 4
item.description:
In this series, Jerry teaches that we have a Covenant of Increase with God!

This covenant dates back to Genesis when He (God) made a covenant with Abraham ‚Äú‚Ä¶I will make my covenant between me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly.‚Äù We are Abraham‚Äôs seed and are heirs to this covenant and promise.

God commanded us to increase exceedingly. For us to fail or lack is a violation of our covenant. God wants to bring increase to every area of our lives!

item.title: Receive God's Maximum, Part 2
item.description:
It's time to break free from limiting beliefs and unleash your maximum potential.

Many Christians want God's best yet are unwilling to do what is required to attain it. Learn how to walk in God's blessing, and see the effects of God's glory in your life.

Remove the constraints. Envision new possibilities and begin to encounter God's maximum every day of your life.

"And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus." Philippians 4:7

item.description:

Don't allow small thinking to hold you back. Begin to seize God's maximum results today. Learn God's strategy for overcoming life's challenges and experience unstoppable momentum in your life.

item.title: Why Some Aren't Experiencing God's Best, Part 7
item.description:
Is it possible for you to experience a greater level of God's goodness and favor?

Learn how to strengthen your faith and refuse to allow the enemy to rob you of God's best.

Do you value the blessing of God on your life and what it can produce for you? Begin to order your lives in accordance with God's way and put yourself in position to receive His best.

‚ÄúBut those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.‚Äù Isaiah 40:31

item.title: Nature of a Seed, Part 4
item.description:
What is the purpose of a seed? Its nature is to grow, to mature, to reproduce. That's all the seed knows to do. Discover what's stopping you from receiving a bountiful harvest.

Don't settle for a mediocre harvest. Your seeds are meant to grow and multiply even in harsh, less-than-ideal circumstances. Your seed will fight to fulfill its purpose.

‚ÄúWhile the earth remains, seedtime and harvest, cold and heat, summer and winter, day and night, shall not cease.‚Äù - Genesis 8:22

item.title: Maximizing Your Harvest, Part 6
item.description:
Are you ready to remove lack and break free from financial bondage? It's time to move to a higher level of God's blessing and goodness.

Learn the keys to receiving the most out of your sowing and discover how God has plans to prosper you.

Now is the time to trust God's Word and watch your seed produce a maximum harvest.

‚ÄúGive, and it will be given to you; a good measure‚Äîpressed down, shaken together, and running over‚Äù

Luke 6:38

item.title: Faith & Patience, Part 4
item.description:
Did you know patience is one of the greatest keys to receiving from God? It‚Äôs through faith and patience that the promises of God are obtained.

By applying the principles in this faith-filled teaching, you will:

- strengthen your resolve for God‚Äôs promises

- develop the power to conquer the temptation to quit

- and learn the skills to overcome stress and frustration

You can outlast any challenge and become the winner God calls you to be. Your victory is on the way! If you stand strong and stay the course, you will see God‚Äôs favor and blessing.

item.title: A Life of Faith Brings Abundant Overflow, Part 6
item.description:
Are you ready for more of God‚Äôs goodness and favor?

Begin expecting ‚Äúthe God of more-than-enough‚Äù to show Himself strong on your behalf. Everything that you receive from God is by faith and walking in the favor of God.

This is accomplished by living in faith in the good times and bad times. This kind of faith is essential to be the winner that God wants you to be.

Don‚Äôt limit God or hold back any longer. Discover how you can expand your faith and see God‚Äôs abundant overflow in your life.

item.title: From Devastation to Restoration, Part 4
item.description:
Has your life had setbacks?

regardless of the pressure you may feel, now is not the time to give up. It's the time to get fed up, march into the enemy's camp, and take back what's yours.

You can get a revelation of God's great plans for your life. He wants your life to be better, improved, increased, and multiplied.

Don't get discouraged. You are a candidate for God's restoration.

"Cast your burden on the Lord, and he will sustain you; he will never permit the righteous to be moved." Psalm 55:22

item.title: 2023 - The Year of the Maximum, Part 6
item.description:
Did you know that your harvest is crying out for you?

Every seed you‚Äôve sown is meant to produce a harvest. That harvest wants to be in your hands.

Discover how to walk in a new season of maximum harvest. Average and mediocre don‚Äôt have to be the norm.

‚ÄúLet us not become weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.‚Äù

Galatians 6:9

item.title: Extraordinary Favor, Part 4
item.description:
Do you need more of God‚Äôs favor today? How about Extraordinary Favor? God will pour out His favor and move His mighty hand on your behalf.

While you may be faced with distressing times, God is not going to leave you there. God is merciful, kind, and gracious. His favor can bring you out of impossible-looking situations that would ruin other people.

His extraordinary favor manifesting in your life will turn the worst of times into the best of times.

‚ÄúFor thou, Lord, wilt bless the righteous; with favour wilt thou compass him as with a shield." Psalm 5:12

item.title: Don't Limit God, Part 4
item.description:
Could you be limiting God?

It‚Äôs time to expand your thinking and reject small ideas. It‚Äôs God‚Äôs idea for you to prosper and He is about to pour out his extraordinary abundance and provision. He loves to turn around impossible situations!

Refuse to think small any longer. Learn how to align your life with God‚Äôs plan and receive all He has for you.

‚ÄúAnd we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to His purpose‚Äù Romans 8:28

It‚Äôs time to expand your thinking and reject small ideas. It‚Äôs God‚Äôs idea for you to prosper and He is about to pour out his extraordinary abundance and provision. He loves to turn around impossible situations!

Refuse to think small any longer. Learn how to align your life with God‚Äôs plan and receive all He has for you.

‚ÄúAnd we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to His purpose‚Äù Romans 8:28

item.title: Increase by Association, Part 2
item.description:
Are you hungry to see God move in your life?

Are you ‚Äúwalking" with those who are experiencing the move of God?

Who you associate with has everything to do with your destiny!

God wants you to experience increase in every area of your life.

Not just spiritually, not just physically, not just socially, but also financially.

He wants increase taking place in every area of your life.

God wants to prove to you that the blessing will work in hard times.

He blessed you so that you could excel and rise above everything that is happening around you.

‚ÄúAnd if ye be Christ's, then are ye Abraham's seed, and heirs according to the promise.‚Äù Galatians 3:29

item.title: God Will Rescue You, Part 6
item.description:
What should you do when life gets hard?

Discover how supernatural intervention is on the way. God is about to interrupt Satan‚Äôs plans. Obstacles preventing your breakthrough are about to be removed.

Be inspired to see God take unfavorable circumstances and turn them around for your benefit. Strengthen your faith and understanding of God‚Äôs breakthrough power!

"In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world." John 16:33

item.title: The Unlimited Favor of God, Part 3
item.description:
What if God is about to do more than you could ask or think?

There‚Äôs nothing too big for God. He‚Äôs not limited by the circumstances around you.

Learn to activate your faith for an unprecedented outpouring of God‚Äôs goodness and favor.

Start thinking bigger, start dreaming bigger, and expect our unlimited God to do the unlimited in your life!

"Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding."

Proverbs 3:5

item.title: Stay Positive In Troubled Times, Part 4
item.description:
When times of trouble arise, how can you reject worry and doubt?

Refuse to allow hardships to cause worry and disappointment.

Instead, learn how to respond in hope and expectancy.

Your attitude will cause you to fail or to succeed in every area of life.

Develop a positive, hopeful, expectant attitude no matter what is going on around you.

The key is to remain faithful in your situation knowing that nothing is impossible for God.

‚ÄúGod is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.‚Äù Psalm 46:1

item.title: Living Unashamed, Part 4
item.description:
Do you see yourself the way God sees you?

You can break free from the mistakes of the past and embrace your identity in Christ. Live without the shame and self-doubt that can rob you of your peace, happiness, and purpose.

Embrace the life God has for you and leave the past behind knowing God made you unique and special.

‚ÄúYou, Lord, are forgiving and good, abounding in love to all who call to you.‚Äù Psalm 86:5

item.title: The Open Hand of God, Part 7
item.description:
How can you overcome the storms and challenges of life?

The Bible tells us that the open hand of God has already provided unusual, extraordinary, supernatural provision to those who refuse to be shaken in the midst of chaos and disorder.

In this timely messages, discover how God will satisfy you with everything you need, regardless of the hardships and troubles around you.

‚ÄùYou open your hand and satisfy the desires of every living thing.‚Äù Psalm 145: 16

item.title: Living Your Dream, Part 4
item.description:
What if God has something bigger and greater for your life?

God can make it happen even when others say it's impossible. We serve a God in whom nothing is impossible.

Strengthen your faith to experience God given, God honoring dreams. Break free from small thinking and small living, begin to see God-sized opportunities and advancements.

Don't let unseen limits hold you back any longer, begin to dream bigger, go further, and achieve more for God.

‚ÄúFor the dream comes through much effort‚Äù Ecclesiastes 5:3

item.title: Barrier Breaking Firsts, Part 4
item.description:
Are you ready to see God move in your life like never before?

It's time for you to go further than ever before and receive more of God's promise.

Learn to position yourself for new breakthroughs, new favor, and new blessings. If you will stay in faith, then God will see to it that your dreams become reality.

‚ÄúThy way, O God, is in the sanctuary: who is so great a God as our God? Thou art the God that doest wonders: thou hast declared thy strength among the people.‚Äù (Psalm 77:13-14)

item.title: Life of Faith, Part 6
item.description: Don't you want everything God has provided? The Bible says in Hebrews 11:1 "Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen". It is only by living a life of faith, that we have access to everything that God has provided, through His son Jesus Christ. If there are things you are hoping for, or things that you need, then "seek first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you." (Matthew 6:33)

item.title: A Life of Faith Brings Abundant Overflow, Part 6
item.description:
Are you ready for more of God‚Äôs goodness and favor?

Begin expecting ‚Äúthe God of more-than-enough‚Äù to show Himself strong on your behalf. Everything that you receive from God is by faith and walking in the favor of God.

This is accomplished by living in faith in the good times and bad times. This kind of faith is essential to be the winner that God wants you to be.

Don‚Äôt limit God or hold back any longer. Discover how you can expand your faith and see God‚Äôs abundant overflow in your life.

item.title: Joy and Restoration, Part 4
item.description:
How can joy bring victory and restoration to your life?

God is capable of turning the most impossible situation into a victory.

Don't allow yourself to be robbed of your joy. God will restore what has been taken even when things look impossible. God does not just restore the blessing; He multiplies it.

Stop being an open target for Satan‚Äôs attacks. God has called you to be a victor, not a victim. Discover the Joy and Restoration God has for you.

item.title: Our Covenant of Increase, Part 4
item.description: In this series, Jerry teaches that we have a Covenant of Increase with God! This covenant dates back to Genesis when He (God) made a covenant with Abraham ‚Äú‚Ä¶I will make my covenant between me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly.‚Äù We are Abraham‚Äôs seed and are heirs to this covenant and promise. God commanded us to increase exceedingly. For us to fail or lack is a violation of our covenant. God wants to bring increase to every area of our lives!

item.title: A Life of Faith Brings Abundant Overflow, Part 1
item.description:
Are you ready for more of God‚Äôs goodness and favor?

Begin expecting ‚Äúthe God of more-than-enough‚Äù to show Himself strong on your behalf. Everything that you receive from God is by faith and walking in the favor of God.

This is accomplished by living in faith in the good times and bad times. This kind of faith is essential to be the winner that God wants you to be.

Don‚Äôt limit God or hold back any longer. Discover how you can expand your faith and see God‚Äôs abundant overflow in your life.

item.title: Relentless Faith, Part 6
item.description:
Do you want to outlast and overcome every challenge?

Would you like your faith to be unmoved by life‚Äôs pressure?

Are you willing to fight the good fight of faith?

In order to gain God‚Äôs best in your life you have to hold fast to the word of God.

Don‚Äôt allow the blessing to be stolen from you. Become relentless in your faith and fight for God‚Äôs promise and refuse to accept anything less.

Your life can be changed by the word of God that is sown into your heart; according to Mark 4:14, ‚ÄúThe sower sows the word of God, the good news regarding the way of salvation.‚Äù

Your faith can remain unmoved regardless of what life throws at you.

item.title: Avoiding Distractions & Detours, Part 2
item.description:
In this study, join Jerriann Savelle as she teaches on avoiding the distractions and detours that come from the enemy by putting God first in your life, avoiding comparison with other people, and how to walk in God's grace.

John 10:10 says that, "The thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly." Don't let the enemy stop the plan and purpose God has for you. Avoid the distractions and detours and fulfill the destiny God has set for you!

item.title: God is Working Behind the Scenes, Part 2
item.description:
In Ephesians 3:7-10 (MSG), the Apostle Paul is telling the Ephesians how his life's work was helping people understand the Gospel and mentions in verse 9 that part of his job was to, "...make plain what God, who created all this in the first place, has been doing in secret and behind the scenes all along."

What does it mean for God to work behind the scenes? Join Dr. Jerry Savelle as he teaches on this passage and explains how God starts working behind the scenes as soon as we've said "Amen!" and the importance of praising before we see the promise come to pass!

item.title: Faith in Troubling Times, Part 3
item.description:
Are you facing a troubling situation right now?

What is the right response when it comes to facing those trials?

How should you think when trouble comes to your life?

If you will stay in faith, then God will show your trials are not going to last forever.

You may be under pressure right now with what you're going through. But if you won't give up you will see the exceeding eternal weight of glory.

‚ÄúBecause we don‚Äôt focus our attention on what is seen but on what is unseen.‚Äù 2 Corinthians 4:18

We all experienced times of trouble, but you can respond in faith and come out victorious.

God wants you to prevail over every difficulty you're facing.

If you will stay in faith, then God will show your trials are not going to last forever.

You may be under pressure right now with what you're going through. But if you won't give up you will see the exceeding eternal weight of glory.

‚ÄúBecause we don‚Äôt focus our attention on what is seen but on what is unseen.‚Äù 2 Corinthians 4:18

We all experienced times of trouble, but you can respond in faith and come out victorious.

God wants you to prevail over every difficulty you're facing.

item.title: Expecting the Goodness of God in Your Life, Part 6
item.description:
Expect the goodness of God as never before in your life.

Would you like to know how to walk in favor with God?

Are you ready for God's plan for abundance?

Develop a faith that isn't moved by what you see, what you hear or what you feel.

The God kind of faith unprecedented goodness, goodness like we've never experienced.

Discover the life that God desires for you, expecting his goodness by seeing through the eye of faith.

See beyond your circumstances because God is about to pour out his goodness on his people as never before.

‚ÄúWhile we look not at the things which are seen, but at the things which are not seen: for the things which are seen are temporal; but the things which are not seen are eternal.‚Äù 2 Corinthians 4:18

item.title: Increase by Association, Part 4
item.description:
Are you hungry to see God move in your life?

Are you ‚Äúwalking" with those who are experiencing the move of God?

Who you associate with has everything to do with your destiny!

God wants you to experience increase in every area of your life.

Not just spiritually, not just physically, not just socially, but also financially.

He wants increase taking place in every area of your life.

God wants to prove to you that the blessing will work in hard times.

He blessed you so that you could excel and rise above everything that is happening around you.

‚ÄúAnd if ye be Christ's, then are ye Abraham's seed, and heirs according to the promise.‚Äù

Galatians 3:29

item.title: Abundant Overflow, Part 6
item.description:
Why does God want you to experience abundance?
What does it take to receive God‚Äôs promise?

The truth is, God never intended for you to just barely get by. He wants you to be a blessing to others, and be a part of this worldwide revival and the outpouring of the Holy Spirit.

With a true turning of your heart to the Lord, you can see God fulfill blessing in your life. He wants to revive you, refresh you and restore all that has been stolen.

God will forgive and restore you - this is God‚Äôs promise to all that believe in him. Great things can happen in your life if you are open to Abundant Overflow.

‚ÄúThou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.‚Äù
Psalm 23:5

item.title: How Do You Respond To Adversity, Part 2
item.description:
Why do so many born again Christians never realize their full potential?
Do you know what to do when challenges and hardships arise?

In this series you will learn that you have the capacity for resilience, that the Holy Spirit will assist you in bouncing back no matter what you are going through.

So, make sure to keep a positive mindset and a winner‚Äôs mentality. And remember no matter what you are going through in your life‚Ä¶ Don‚Äôt Quit!

‚ÄúThese things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.‚Äù John 16:33

Why do so many born again Christians never realize their full potential?
Do you know what to do when challenges and hardships arise?

In this series you will learn that you have the capacity for resilience, that the Holy Spirit will assist you in bouncing back no matter what you are going through.

So, make sure to keep a positive mindset and a winner‚Äôs mentality. And remember no matter what you are going through in your life‚Ä¶ Don‚Äôt Quit!

‚ÄúThese things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.‚Äù John 16:33

item.title: Two basic principle for releasing the God kind of faith.
item.description: The Word of Faith message was the very first sermon Dr. Savelle heard preach, and it has stuck with him all these fifty years of ministry. In this four part series Dr. Savelle will show you how to see beyond your present circumstances, how to live by faith, and how to be the winner that God called you to be. Living a life of faith will be one of your greatest adventures, nothing is impossible with God!

item.title: This is Your Defining Moment, Part 2
item.description: What is a defining moment? It's when your character is truly revealed. You will have defining moments in your life that will test your resolve. How you act will determine what direction your life will go in. It can take you on a path of failure and destruction, or on a path to some of your greatest victories.God wants your dreams to come to pass. So, stay in faith.

item.title: God's Promise of Provision, Part 2
item.description:
Who would have ever thought that we would be dealing with the things we're dealing with right now in 2020? God can be your source of peace and hope and prosperity. You must believe that miracles can happen because God works in the supernatural to do the impossible.

You can experience increase and have one of the finest years thus far. Let it be a time when all will see and know that your God is the faithful God.

item.title: Where Is Your Focus When Times Are Bad, Part 2
item.description:
Where's your focus when times are bad? In this teaching Dr. Jerry Savelle shows you through to the Word of God how to stay on target to experience his best for your life.

He wants to restored all that's been stolen from you during tough times. God will not leave you in your troubles and afflictions, he will deliver you! You just have to stay focus and use your faith. Remember, greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world. (1 John 4:4)

item.title: God Is Not Going to Allow You to Fail, Part 2
item.description: God has many promises in His Word assuring that He has designed a life of victory for the Believer, including the scripture in 2 Corinthians 12:9 which says, "My grace is sufficient for thee: for my strength is made perfect in weakness..." However, most Christians today who love God are living below their level of victory that God wants for their lives. If God's grace is sufficient, why don't more of us walk in the fact that we're immune to failure? Dr. Jerry Savelle has a powerful series for you on how to raise your expectation in God to see victory in every area of your life, how to stand on the Word until your circumstances change, and how vital it is to develop a no-quit attitude if you're going to live a life free from failure.

item.title: God's Stimulus Package, Part 2
item.description: Dr. Savelle has a brand new series meant specifically for this time that we're all experiencing. God knew everything that was going to be happening, and His Word is still true. God promises in His word that if we follow Him and obey his commandments, He will bless us. 2020 isn't over, and God has a stimulus package to bring His people through on top!

item.title: Established In Faith, Part 4
item.description: Do you know what it takes to outlast and overcome challenges? Why is it that some believers seem to struggle while others thrive? In this new series "Established In Faith," Dr. Savelle reveals the key principals that have brought stability and victory in his life for over 50 years, and more importantly how you can walk in victory over your circumstances as well!

In this new series "Established In Faith," Dr. Savelle reveals the key principals that have brought stability and victory in his life for over 50 years, and more importantly how you can walk in victory over your circumstances as well!

item.title: Quitting Is Not An Option, Part 4
item.description: 1st John 5:4 says, ‚Äú‚Ä¶whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.‚Äù The Word says we are overcomers, and God will never say it's over until you win, but how do you continue to stand while the battle is still going? In this teaching, Dr. Jerry Savelle takes us through to the Word to show us how to conquer the temptation to quit, how to stay in faith for our victory, how to stay focused on God by developing patience, and why we should make the decision to never quit.

item.title: A Set Time, Part 2
item.description:
God is faithful to keep His promises. When God makes a promise He sees that it is fulfilled no matter what is going on in our personal lives or in the country. Nothing can derail God's promises for our lives.

In this powerful 2 part series, Dr. Savelle shows us from the Word of God three key points:

- How to triumph over opposition
- How God‚Äôs presence brings miracles
- and How to embrace your full potential in Christ

item.title: Seeing & Knowing, Part 5
item.description:
Are you ready for what God is about to do? Would you like to discover the biblical keys for knowing God‚Äôs plan for you and your family?

In this new series Dr. Jerry Savelle explains the Spirit of Seeing and Knowing.

The principles revealed in this series will equip and position you to be ready for what is coming. God doesn‚Äôt want you in the dark. He desires to show you what He‚Äôs about to do.

Without revelation knowledge, God‚Äôs people perish and miss out on His blessing. Now is the time to get in-tune with God and live with confidence and faith for His plan.

Don‚Äôt delay any longer. Call, or go online now to jerrysavelle.org and request your copy of the ‚ÄúSeeing and Knowing‚Äù special package.

Your best days are ahead! Discover today how God reveals His plan so you can respond in faith and walk in His goodness and purpose.

item.title: From Devastation To Restoration, Part 4
item.description: You can go from devastation to restoration! Jerry Savelle teaches that regardless of the pressure you may feel, now is not the time to give up. It‚Äôs the time to get fed up, march into the enemy‚Äôs camp and take back what's yours! You can get a revelation of God‚Äôs great plans for your life. He wants your life to be better, improved, increased and multiplied.

item.title: Faith & Patience, Part 4
item.description:
Did you know patience is one of the greatest keys to receiving from God? It‚Äôs through faith and patience that the promises of God are obtained.
By applying the principles in this faith-filled teaching, you will: - strengthen your resolve for God‚Äôs promises - develop the power to conquer the temptation to quite - and learn the skills to overcome stress and frustration
You can outlast any challenge and become the winner God calls you to be. Your victory is on the way! If you stand strong and stay the course, you will see God‚Äôs favor and blessing.

item.title: 2020 Year For Supernatural Increase Part 5
item.description: Is it possible to limit God's ability in your life? Sometimes we have inadvertently limited God by doing or not doing certain things. The good news is you can break free from whatever is holding you backhand begin to experience the life God created you to live! You were created to live life more abundantly, and now is the time to dream bigger than ever before, because God's glory knows no limits!

item.title: Our Covenant of Marvels and Wonders Part 9
item.description: In this new series Dr. Jerry Savelle explains how God wants Marvels, wonders and signs to be part of the normal Christian life. Some of the key themes that Dr. Savelle explains are: The three acts of faith that usher in God‚Äôs wonders, the role angels play in the manifestation of God‚Äôs greatness in our lives, and the role finances are to play in end times.

item.title: Count It All Joy Part 4
item.description: Dr. Savelle's daughter Jerriann shares how we can be joyful when we're going through life's struggles big and small. The answer is Jesus. He gives us the wisdom to walk through everything that comes our way and not just walk through it, but have joy in the process. The bible says that Joy is a force. In the midst of adversity, learn how you can allow the force of joy to rise up on the inside of you.

item.title: The Prayer of Petition Part 4
item.description: When God‚Äôs people pray, they want answers. Yet many Christians don‚Äôt know how to pray both effectively‚Äîin a way that gets results‚Äî and humbly‚Äîin a way that aligns with God‚Äôs will. Prayer is a powerful weapon against the true adversaries of God‚Äôs people: principalities, powers, dark rulers and spiritual wickedness in high places. These forces are the perpetrators of all kinds of evil: Addiction, abuse, poverty and spiritual bondage run rampant through families, churches, cities and nations. What can believers do to battle these forces? They can pray.

item.title: Increase By Association Part 2
item.description: In the anointed teaching, ‚ÄúIncrease by Association,‚Äù Jerry Savelle shares that increase is contagious and primarily comes through association. If you surround yourself with godly people who think and dream big, that same anointing will come on you. Who you associate with has everything to do with your destiny.

item.itunes:subtitle: Increase By Association Part 1
item.itunes:summary: In the anointed teaching, ‚ÄúIncrease by Association,‚Äù Jerry Savelle shares that increase is contagious and primarily comes through association. If you surround yourself with godly people who think and dream big, that same anointing will come on you. Who you associate with has everything to do with your destiny.

item.title: Take The Limits Off God Part 2
item.description: God has called us to live a life without limits. Unfortunately, one of the biggest hinderances we can face are the ones we create ourselves by placing limits on what God can do in our lives. Often times we let doubt and unbelief creep in and rob us. In this series, brother Jerry shows through scripture, how our level expectancy is directly linked to the level of blessing we walk in. Turn up your expectancy and start living a life without limits today!

item.title: The Word of Faith Part 4
item.description: The Word of Faith message was the very first sermon Dr. Savelle heard preach, and it has stuck with him all these fifty years of ministry. In this four part series Dr. Savelle will show you how to see beyond your present circumstances, how to live by faith, and how to be the winner that God called you to be. Living a life of faith will be one of your greatest adventures, nothing is impossible with God!

item.title: The Year of the Abundant Harvest, Part 6
item.description: God wants you to be an aggressive harvester. All too often Christians are amazing sowers, but collectively fail to harvest what is rightfully theirs. In this 6 part series, Dr. Savelle shows through scripture that God never forgets a seed sown, but that there are forces at work to keep them from harvesting. Watch this series again and again, so you too can walk in the abundant harvest God has for you!

item.title: Don't Quit, Part 4
item.description: The Bible says ‚ÄúAll things are possible to them that believe.‚Äù Are you a believer? Then you must make the quality decision that quitting is no longer an option, and that failure is unacceptable. You must overcome the temptation to quit. I learned a long time ago, when you're under the greatest pressure to quit, that's always an indication Satan just fired his best shot! And if this one doesn't get you, he's finished and you win!

item.title: Marvels, Wonders and Extraordinary Manifestations of the Greatness of Our God, Part 6
item.description: God promised us in Exodus 34 that He would do ‚Äúmarvels, such as have not been done in all the earth, nor in any nation.‚Äù God is highlighting this covenant He made with the body of Christ. Dr. Savelle is now taking the fresh insight he‚Äôs received on it, and is declaring to you today marvels, wonders, and extraordinary manifestations of the greatness of our God.

item.title: Show Me Your Glory, Part 6 of 6
item.description: In these messages, Dr. Savelle teaches on what it takes to experience God's glory in our lives. It doesn‚Äôt just happen, we have a part to play. We need to hunger for it, pray for it, and believe for it. Through scripture he will show how God's glory is the manifested presence of God, power of God and goodness of God.

item.title: Show Me Your Glory, Part 1 of 6
item.description: Is these messages, Dr. Savelle shares his insight that although God wants to manifest His glory in our lives, it doesn‚Äôt just happen. We have a part to play. We need to hunger for it, pray for it, and believe for it. God's glory is the manifested presence of God, power of God and goodness of God. When you experience God's glory you can overcome every situation the enemy could ever throw at you. It is the answer and solution to whatever you are facing!

When you experience God's glory you can overcome every situation the enemy could ever throw at you. It is the answer and solution to whatever you are facing!

item.title: The God of the Breakthrough, Part 4 of 4
item.description: God knows exactly what you're going through. He has seen your frustration. He's heard your pain. And He has a plan for your breakthrough mapped out in His Word. Jerry Savelle unveils that plan in a way that is clear and easy to understand. He has an assignment from God to teach believers how to get their hearts right, their homes in order, and their finances prepared for a supernatural breakthrough.

item.title: Prayer of Petition, Petitioning God for Prosperity, Part 4 of 4
item.description: When God‚Äôs people pray, they want answers. Yet many Christians don‚Äôt know how to pray both effectively‚Äîin a way that gets results‚Äî and humbly‚Äîin a way that aligns with God‚Äôs will. The Prayer of Petition, known throughout Christian history as the prayer that gets results. These broadcast explore this powerful prayer in detail, from the many examples found in God‚Äôs Word to more recent instances of incredible miracles ushered in by this prayer.

item.title: Making the Prophetic Word Your World, Part 4
item.description: How does the prophetic word become a reality in your life? In this 4 part series, Dr. Jerry Savelle shows you that once you strengthen your faith, you will see God‚Äôs prophetic word become the world you experience. All throughout Scripture, God spoke to the prophets so that they would see into the future and envision the world through the eyes of God! When you grab hold of a prophetic word, by faith, the Holy Spirit begins painting a picture on the canvas of your heart. He will show you the desired future God has planned for you! Dr. Savelle wants you to experience it and walk in it every day of your life.

item.title: Quitting Is Not An Option, Part 4
item.description: 1st John 5:4 says, ‚Äú‚Ä¶whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.‚Äù The Word says we are overcomers, and God will never say it's over until you win, but how do you continue to stand while the battle is still going? In this teaching, Dr. Jerry Savelle takes us through to the Word to show us how to conquer the temptation to quit, how to stay in faith for our victory, how to stay focused on God by developing patience, and why we should make the decision to never quit.

item.title: Trusting God in Challenging Times, Part 4
item.description: Are you or someone you know going through a difficult or challenging situation? Perhaps a bad or failed relationship, death of a loved one, a job, etc‚Ä¶ Sometimes life isn‚Äôt easy or go as we had thought it would but, there is always hope with our God. In this series, Jerriann Savelle shows us through scripture, that whatever obstacles and challenges we face, that 'joy will come in the morning.'(Psalm 30:5). We need to remain steadfast in knowing that God is in control, and 'works for the good of those that love him.'(Romans 8:28) Peace, healing, comfort and purpose can only be found in the Lord.

item.title: Calling In Your Harvest, Part 4
item.description: What‚Äôs keeping you from claiming your rightful harvest? In these powerful messages, Dr. Jerry Savelle explains the Spiritual laws that govern the reaping of a harvest that has been reserved just for you. God never forgets your offerings and the seeds you sow. Start expecting extraordinary things to happen after you‚Äôve planted your seed. Your harvest is just waiting to go to its rightful owner! Harvest time has come!

item.title: Avoiding Distractions & Detours, Part 2
item.description:
In this study, join Jerriann Savelle as she teaches on avoiding the distractions and detours that come from the enemy by putting God first in your life, avoiding comparison with other people, and how to walk in God's grace.
John 10:10 says that, "The thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly." Don't let the enemy stop the plan and purpose God has for you. Avoid the distractions and detours and fulfill the destiny God has set for you!

item.title: God is Working Behind the Scenes, Part 2
item.description: In Ephesians 3:7-10 (MSG), the Apostle Paul is telling the Ephesians how his life's work was helping people understand the Gospel and mentions in verse 9 that part of his job was to, "...make plain what God, who created all this in the first place, has been doing in secret and behind the scenes all along." What does it mean for God to work behind the scenes? Join Dr. Jerry Savelle as he teaches on this passage and explains how God starts working behind the scenes as soon as we've said "Amen!" and the importance of praising before we see the promise come to pass!

item.title: The Power of Thanksgiving and Praise, Part 4
item.description: In Psalm chapter 86 David is reflecting on the mercy, compassion, comfort and strength that the Lord had blessed him with and he says to God, ‚ÄúI will praise You, O Lord my God, with all my heart, and I will glorify Your name forevermore.‚Äù David‚Äôs thankfulness and praise put him in position to receive an outpouring of God‚Äôs favor and blessings in his life. Join Jerry Savelle & his daughter Jerriann Savelle as they teach on the importance of giving God thanksgiving and praise for every blessing in our lives, no matter how big or small, and how to walk in a continuous attitude of gratitude.

item.title: Increase by Association
item.description:
This is possibly the most powerful message that Brother Jerry has ever preached. It came to him by revelation of the Holy Spirit and has had a profound impact upon thousands of people all over the world.
He shows examples throughout the Bible where people who associate with those who are bless by God receive similar increase and blessings. If you get around people who think big, who have big dreams and who refuse to give up in adversity then consequently, that same anointing will come upon you. Who you associate with has everything to do with your destiny.

item.title: Honoring Your Heritage of Faith, Part 2
item.description: Join Jerry Savelle and his special guest Richard Roberts as they discuss "Honoring Your Heritage of Faith". The Bible is full of faithful men and women who lived by faith and we have been commanded to do the same. In Romans 1:17 it says "For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith: as it is written, The just shall live by faith." God is looking for faith. He's looking for men and women who will believe Him, who will stand up for His Word, and only believe!

item.title: The Spirit of Faith, Part 2
item.description: In 2 Corinthians 4:13, the apostle Paul says, "We having the same spirit of faith, according as it is written..." It is one thing to simply hear the word of faith taught but it is something completely different to catch the spirit of faith - not just having head knowledge but having the God-kind of faith cultivated down deep in you heart. We become "doers" of the Word (not just "hearers") when we go past just knowing what faith is to putting faith-filled words into action! If you want to live in victory, CATCH THE SPIRIT OF FAITH!

item.title: Keys to a Miraculous Breakthrough
item.description: Every time you need a breakthrough, there is a "word" from the Lord for you. Spend time in His Word and He will show you. Don't just start doing anything and everything - get in His Word. And the moment you get "your word", be obedient to do it. Don't hesitate, don't wait, obey! Develop an unwavering faith that God will honor His Word to you!
item.author: webmaster@jerrysavelle.org
item.itunes:author: Jerry Savelle Ministries

Develop an unwavering faith that God will honor His Word to you!

item.title: Make the Decision Not to Quit, Part 4
item.description: Don't Quit! Apostle Paul said "Having done all to stand, stand therefore". He stood strong for what he believed and near the end of his life he could say, "I have fought a good fight. I have kept the faith, I have finished my course...and there is a crown of righteousness waiting for me." He refused to quit! Make your decision today that "quit" is not an option. Two of Brother Jerry's favorite scriptures are Micah 7:8 "Rejoice not against me, O my enemy! When I fall, I shall arise..." and Proverbs 24:16 "For a just man falls seven times, and rises up again..." No matter what fiery darts might come your way, no matter how many times you might get knocked down, GET UP, DON'T QUIT!

item.itunes:summary: Don't Quit! Apostle Paul said "Having done all to stand, stand therefore". He stood strong for what he believed and near the end of his life he could say, "I have fought a good fight. I have kept the faith, I have finished my course...and there is a crown of righteousness waiting for me." He refused to quit! Make your decision today that "quit" is not an option. Two of Brother Jerry's favorite scriptures are Micah 7:8 "Rejoice not against me, O my enemy! When I fall, I shall arise..." and Proverbs 24:16 "For a just man falls seven times, and rises up again..." No matter what fiery darts might come your way, no matter how many times you might get knocked down, GET UP, DON'T QUIT!

item.title: Faith & Patience, Part 2
item.description: God doesn't want you feeling overwhelmed, stressed out or frustrated. Hebrews 6:12 says "That with faith and patience you will inherit the promises of God." Often times we put things on our time frame instead of God's time frame, but Galatians 6:9 says that "there's a due season for everything we're going through." That means there's a set time for your breakthrough! It might look impossible now but your breakthrough is on the way! It just takes faith in God's Word and patience for His timing.

item.title: Don't Quit, Part 4
item.description: The Bible says ‚ÄúAll things are possible to them that believe.‚Äù Are you a believer? Then you must make the quality decision that quitting is no longer an option, and that failure is unacceptable. You must overcome the temptation to quit. I learned a long time ago, when you're under the greatest pressure to quit, that's always an indication Satan just fired his best shot! And if this one doesn't get you, he's finished and you win!

item.title: Reigning in Life, Part 4
item.description: You are not meant to live in defeat! Romans 5:17 says: "For if by one man's offense death reigned by one; much more they which receive abundance of grace and of the gift of righteousness shall reign in life by one, Jesus Christ." If you have receive an abundance of grace and the gift of righteousness then you should be reigning if life! Revelation 1:5-6 ...Unto him that loved us, and washed us from our sins in his own blood, 6 And hath made us kings and priests unto God...

item.title: Don‚Äôt Let Go of Your Faith, Part 2
item.description: Using your faith is God's method for victory over the enemy and all the evil things of this world. The Bible says that without faith it is impossible to please God. When we believe God's Word in faith we experience healing, deliverance, prosperity and more.. In Proverbs 28:29 it says ‚Äú‚Ä¶that a faithful man shall abound in blessings.‚Äù Doesn't this sound good to you? It does to me! So don‚Äôt let go of your faith! Do whatever it takes to continue to increase your faith - listen, read, meditate on God's Word and stay focused on Him.

item.title: Excelling In What God Has Called You To Do, Part 2
item.description: Join Dr. Savelle and his special guest, Trey Johnson. Through Trey‚Äôs powerful testimony of God‚Äôs restoration they teach on how God desires for you to excel in everything you are called to do. Once you fully surrender to God‚Äôs call on your life, and make him number one priority, he can then turn your passions into tools for his kingdom.

item.title: Keys to a Flourishing Lifestyle, Part 4
item.description: God‚Äôs plan for us is to have a flourishing lifestyle. In Proverbs 28:20 it says ‚ÄúA faithful man shall abound with blessings:‚Äù and in Deuteronomy 28:2 ‚Äú‚Ä¶all these blessing shall come on thee, and overtake thee‚Ä¶‚Äù So if God is looking for faithfulness, our pursuit should be faithfulness. The result of faithfulness is, the blessings will began pursuing you. Remember it says, "these blessing shall come on thee, and overtake thee". It didn't say, "You'll come on them and overtake them." If you're doing what God wants you to do, if you're faithful at it, then the blessings will hunt you down and they'll come on you, they'll overtake you and you will flourish in the blessings!

item.title: Path to a Lifestyle of Flourishing, Part 2
item.description: God has a path for you to have a flourishing life! As Christians we are promised more than just eternal life in heaven but also an abundant life while here on earth. In John 10:10 (AMPC) Jesus said ‚ÄúI came that they may have and enjoy life, and have it in abundance (to the full, till it overflows).‚Äù In these messages you will learn what it takes to stay on God‚Äôs path and not quit.

In John 10:10 (AMPC) Jesus said ‚ÄúI came that they may have and enjoy life, and have it in abundance (to the full, till it overflows).‚Äù In these messages you will learn what it takes to stay on God‚Äôs path and not quit.

item.title: Becoming Free, Part 4
item.description: As Christians we should never become hopeless because our God is a God of hope! John 10:10 says ‚ÄúThe thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.‚Äù If you have let negative feelings and emotions creep in and bring despair or hopelessness take a stand against those emotions today. Put your faith and trust in what God‚Äôs word says!

item.title: Life of Faith, Part 6
item.description: Don't you want everything God has provided? The Bible says in Hebrews 11:1 "Now faith is the substance of things hoped for, the evidence of things not seen". It is only by living a life of faith, that we have access to everything that God has provided, through His son Jesus Christ. If there are things you are hoping for, or things that you need, then "seek first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you." (Matthew 6:33)

item.title: Prayer of Petition, Part 8
item.description: When God‚Äôs people pray, they want answers. Yet many Christians don‚Äôt know how to pray both effectively‚Äîin a way that gets results‚Äî and humbly‚Äîin a way that aligns with God‚Äôs will. The Prayer of Petition, known throughout Christian history as the prayer that gets results. These broadcast explore this powerful prayer in detail, from the many examples found in God‚Äôs Word to more recent instances of incredible miracles ushered in by this prayer.

item.title: Increase By Association, Part 2
item.description: Jerry Savelle and his good friend Jesse Duplantis tag team preach on the subject of Increase by Association. They show examples throughout the Bible where people who associate with those who are bless by God receive similar increase and blessings. God says He will supply all our needs according to His riches in glory and give us the desires of our hearts.

item.title: The Faithful Shall Flourish, Part 3
item.description: Are you battling issues with your health, finances or relationships? In this series Jerry Savelle shares his powerful testimony of God‚Äôs healing power in his body. Proverbs 4:22 says God‚Äôs word is ‚Äúlife for those who find them, and health to all their flesh‚Äù. No matter what you are dealing with God‚Äôs word is more powerful! The Lord shared with Jerry that in 2017 ‚ÄúThe Faithful shall flourish and it shall be like the days of Heaven on earth.‚Äù

item.title: Our Covenant of Increase, Part 4
item.description: In this new series, Jerry teaches that we have a Covenant of Increase with God! This covenant dates back to Genesis when He (God) made a covenant with Abraham ‚Äú‚Ä¶I will make my covenant between me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly.‚Äù We are Abraham‚Äôs seed and are heirs to this covenant and promise. God commanded us to increase exceedingly. For us to fail or lack is a violation of our covenant. God wants to bring increase to every area of our lives!

This covenant dates back to Genesis when He (God) made a covenant with Abraham ‚Äú‚Ä¶I will make my covenant between me and thee, and will multiply thee exceedingly.‚Äù We are Abraham‚Äôs seed and are heirs to this covenant and promise. God commanded us to increase exceedingly. For us to fail or lack is a violation of our covenant. God wants to bring increase to every area of our lives!

item.title: Redeemed and Restored, Part 4
item.description: In this study, I believe you are going to receive divine revelation on what it means to be redeemed and restored. No matter what you are going through God has a path for success. Once you call upon the Lord and put your faith and trust in him your breakthrough is on its way. Get read for things to change suddenly!

item.title: Living in a Continual State of God's Favor, Part 4
item.description: In this powerful series, Jerry Savelle demonstrates through scripture that we should not just experience God's favor occasionally but rather we can live in a continual state of God's favor. In Luke 4:19 Jesus said: (I have come) "To proclaim the accepted and acceptable year of the Lord [the day when salvation and the free favors of God profusely abound]." Once we have accept what Jesus did on Calvary we have a right to live a life full of God's favor all day and every day.

item.title: Keys to Living Your Dreams, Part 4
item.description: In this series, Jerry Savelle's daughter, Terri Savelle Foy explains the importance to dream and have a vision for your life. If you don't have a vision or dreams for your life than you're just existing. In Proverbs 29:18 it says, Where there is no vision, the people perish. You have to know where you are headed before you can start taking steps towards it. Give yourself permission to dream! Don't let the devil tell you that you're to young, to old, made to many mistakes, not smart enough, etc. Look at all that is ahead of you not what is behind you. God still wants to use you, he has a plan for your life.

item.title: God Wants You to Live a Normal Lifestyle, Part 2
item.description: Have you accepted the world's viewpoint of normal without even realizing it? In this two part series, Dr. Savelle teaches how to Break loose from the limits of the world and live a lifestyle in God's normal. Learn what it means to live a normal kind of life according to God and how not accept the worlds limits that want to hold you down. Today is your day to live free from the worlds normal.

item.title: Faith, Part 4
item.description: Are you believing for a mountain to moved in your life? Are you fed up with not living a life full of victories? In this powerful series, Jerriann Savelle and special guest Kellie Copeland teaches on what it‚Äôs like to live a life full of Victories. How God can take just a little faith and make it exceeding faith to overcome any mountain you may have in your way. Learn how to walk in a life of FAITH.

item.title: You're Somebody Special To God - Part 4
item.description: In this series, Jerry and his daughter Jerriann teach that we have all sinned and missed the mark but, once you accept Jesus as your savior you are a new creature and are crowned with glory and honor! God doesn't see your past instead he sees your future. God gave his only son just for you because you are valuable and special to him! Because of Calvary we can now stand boldly in his presence just as if we had never sinned at all.

item.title: The Established Heart - Part 4
item.description: The times in which we live today offer us ample opportunity to be troubled, to be afraid, and to be shaken by bad news. In this series Dr. Savelle shares major revelations from God's Word that you can apply to develop an established heart. When your heart is established, you can truly make a difference for God in your life, in your family, and in the world.

item.title: Calling In Your Harvest #4
item.description: What‚Äôs keeping you from claiming your rightful harvest? In these powerful messages, Dr. Jerry Savelle explains the Spiritual laws that govern the reaping of a harvest that has been reserved just for you. God never forgets your offerings and the seeds you sow. Start expecting extraordinary things to happen after you‚Äôve planted your seed. Your harvest is just waiting to go to its rightful owner! Harvest time has come!

item.title: Show Me Your Glory, Part 1 or 4
item.description: Is these messages, Dr. Savelle shares his insight that although God wants to manifest His glory in our lives, it doesn‚Äôt just happen. We have a part to play. We need to hunger for it, pray for it, and believe for it. God's glory is the manifested presence of God, power of God and goodness of God. When you experience God's glory you can overcome every situation the enemy could ever throw at you. It is the answer and solution to whatever you are facing!
item.author: webmaster@jerrysavelle.org
item.itunes:author: Jerry Savelle Ministries
item.itunes:subtitle: Supernatural Provision
item.itunes:summary: Hear Jerry Savelle share about our more-than-enough God. Our God has unlimited ways of supplying what we need, and His hand is ever ready to provide. In Philippians 4:19 the Apostle Paul tell us, "And my God will meet all your needs according to the riches of his glory in Christ Jesus." Paul's words are just as true today as they were over 2000 years ago!

item.title: Receive Your Miracle Now
item.description: Join Jerry Savelle as he shares about living in these last days. The time for greater works (signs, wonders and miracles) is now so the world sees that God is alive. In the gospel of John, Jesus tells us that "Truly, truly, I say to you, whoever believes in me will also do the works that I do; and greater works than these will he do, because I am going to the Father."

item.title: Dreams, Destiny & Opportunities #4
item.description: Join Dr. Savelle's daughters for a special series as they teach about the faith it takes to reach the God given dreams in your life. Both ministers of the Gospel, Jerriann Savelle Newton and Terri Savelle Foy, give real life examples on how to build yourself up in the Word and expand your vision ‚Äì and share steps they‚Äôve taken that will enable you to reach your full potential as you exercise and stretch your faith. Things that may seem impossible to us are possible with God.

item.title: No Boundaries #4
item.description: Do you have limits on your life? Many do and don‚Äôt even realize it. In this program, Jerry Savelle will help you discover through God's Word how to live beyond the world's restrictions and limitations! You are a child of God, and with God, all things are possible to those who believe.

item.title: Free To Be Me #4
item.description: Join Jerry Savelle and his daughter, Jerriann, as they discuss what it means to be the person God created you to be. Each and every person has been created with unique traits & skills, God doesn't want to change that, he wants to use it. By using real-life examples and through scripture they both show how to be happy and free being yourself.

item.title: The Force of Joy #4
item.description: The Joy of the Lord is your strength! It doesn't matter what kind of obstacle the devil throws before you. If you are willing tap into the force of joy that the Spirit of God has placed in each believer you can walk in victory. In John 15:1-11, Jesus reminds us to focus on him not the surroundings, and if we do our joy will remain and be full!

item.title: Living in the Fullness of the Blessing #4
item.description:
Experience God's blessing in your life like never before. In these teachings Jerry Savelle lays a biblical foundation for "Living in the fullness of the blessing" and encourages you to live a life without limitations!
The blessing of God is an empowerment that comes on your life when you are born again. But sadly, many Christians are not living in the fullness of the blessing that God intended. When the blessing of God is on your life, you are not limited to the natural any more. You have something working for you that other people don‚Äôt have.

item.title: Blessed & Redeemed #4
item.description: In this broadcast Jerry Savelle explains how God‚Äôs redemptive plan is complete and perfect, covering every area of our lives. He not only redeemed us from a life without hope and a dark eternity, but much, much more. And it all started at the Cross. The Apostle Paul believed it was the most important revelation that he passed on to the Church. This powerful series will give you a better and more complete understanding of the importance of the Cross and Jesus‚Äô victorious resurrection. His finished work at the Cross is the essence of God‚Äôs power and fullness of blessing in our lives.

item.title: Prayer of Petition, Petitioning God For Prosperity #4
item.description: When God‚Äôs people pray, they want answers. Yet many Christians don‚Äôt know how to pray both effectively - in a way that gets results - and humbly - in a way that aligns with God‚Äôs will. The Prayer of Petition, known throughout Christian history as the prayer that gets results. These broadcast explore this powerful prayer in detail, from the many examples found in God‚Äôs Word to more recent instances of incredible miracles ushered in by this prayer.

item.title: Restored to Dream Again
item.description: Do you think what you've been through can ever be restored? Can God make it even better than what it was before? Join Jerry Savelle and his daughters, Jerriann and Terri, as they discuss this important issue from Jerriann's new book "Happy to Be Me."
item.itunes:author: Jerry Savelle Ministries
item.itunes:subtitle: Restored to Dream Again

item.title: Freedom in Forgiveness
item.description: Have you ever been in a traffic jam and unable to move forward? Finally you pass through major road construction. Holding on to unforgiveness works the same way by delaying the progress God has for you. Join Jerry Savelle and his daughters, Jerriann and Terri, as they share about finding your freedom through forgiveness.
